pkgmetadata.longdescription: Neko project 2 kai (np2kai for short) is a PC-9801 emulator written in C and C++. It allows for i286, ia32 and haxm emulation. It is based on Neko project II.

use.flag: Enable i286 emulation USE="ia32" or USE="haxm" will disable it, unless all 3 emulation USE flags are set
